development.name: AG_GRID_TABLE_ENABLED
development.description: Enables Table V2 (AG Grid) viz plugin

development.name: ALERT_REPORT_TABS
development.description: Enables experimental tabs UI for Alerts and Reports

development.name: CSV_UPLOAD_PYARROW_ENGINE
development.description: Experimental PyArrow engine for CSV parsing (may have issues with dates/nulls)

development.name: DATASET_FOLDERS
development.description: Allow metrics and columns to be grouped into folders in the chart builder

development.name: DATE_RANGE_TIMESHIFTS_ENABLED
development.description: Enable support for date range timeshifts (e.g., "2015-01-03 : 2015-01-04") in addition to relative timeshifts (e.g., "1 day ago")

development.name: ENABLE_EXTENSIONS
development.description: Enable Superset extensions for custom functionality without modifying core

development.name: MATRIXIFY
development.description: Enable Matrixify feature for matrix-style chart layouts

development.name: OPTIMIZE_SQL
development.description: Try to optimize SQL queries — for now only predicate pushdown is supported

development.name: PRESTO_EXPAND_DATA
development.description: Expand nested types in Presto into extra columns/arrays. Experimental, doesn't work with all nested types.

development.name: TABLE_V2_TIME_COMPARISON_ENABLED
development.description: Enable Table V2 time comparison feature

development.name: TAGGING_SYSTEM
development.description: Enables the tagging system for organizing assets

testing.name: ALERT_REPORTS_FILTER
testing.description: Enables filter functionality in Alerts and Reports

testing.name: ALERT_REPORT_SLACK_V2
testing.description: Enables Slack V2 integration for Alerts and Reports

testing.name: ALERT_REPORT_WEBHOOK
testing.description: Enables webhook integration for Alerts and Reports

testing.name: ALLOW_FULL_CSV_EXPORT
testing.description: Allow users to export full CSV of table viz type. Warning: Could cause server memory/compute issues with large datasets.

testing.name: AWS_DATABASE_IAM_AUTH
testing.description: Enable AWS IAM authentication for database connections (Aurora, Redshift). Allows cross-account role assumption via STS AssumeRole. Security note: When enabled, ensure Superset's IAM role has restricted sts:AssumeRole permissions to prevent unauthorized access.

testing.name: CACHE_IMPERSONATION
testing.description: Enable caching per impersonation key in datasources with user impersonation

testing.name: DATE_FORMAT_IN_EMAIL_SUBJECT
testing.description: Allow users to optionally specify date formats in email subjects

testing.name: ENABLE_DASHBOARD_DOWNLOAD_WEBDRIVER_SCREENSHOT
testing.description: Generate screenshots (PDF/JPG) of dashboards using web driver. Depends on ENABLE_DASHBOARD_SCREENSHOT_ENDPOINTS.

testing.name: ENABLE_DASHBOARD_SCREENSHOT_ENDPOINTS
testing.description: Enables endpoints to cache and retrieve dashboard screenshots via webdriver. Requires Celery and THUMBNAIL_CACHE_CONFIG.

testing.name: ENABLE_SUPERSET_META_DB
testing.description: Allows users to add a superset:// DB that can query across databases. Experimental with potential security/performance risks. See SUPERSET_META_DB_LIMIT.

testing.name: ESTIMATE_QUERY_COST
testing.description: Enable query cost estimation. Supported in Presto, Postgres, and BigQuery. Requires `cost_estimate_enabled: true` in database `extra` attribute.

testing.name: GLOBAL_ASYNC_QUERIES
testing.description: Enable async queries for dashboards and Explore via WebSocket. Requires Redis 5.0+ and Celery workers.

testing.name: IMPERSONATE_WITH_EMAIL_PREFIX
testing.description: When impersonating a user, use the email prefix instead of username

testing.name: PLAYWRIGHT_REPORTS_AND_THUMBNAILS
testing.description: Replace Selenium with Playwright for reports and thumbnails. Supports deck.gl visualizations. Requires playwright pip package.

testing.name: RLS_IN_SQLLAB
testing.description: Apply RLS rules to SQL Lab queries. Requires query parsing/manipulation. May break queries or allow RLS bypass. Use with care!

testing.name: SSH_TUNNELING
testing.description: Allow users to enable SSH tunneling when creating a DB connection. DB engine must support SSH Tunnels.

stable.name: ALERTS_ATTACH_REPORTS
stable.description: When enabled, alerts send email/slack with screenshot AND link. When disabled, alerts send only link; reports still send screenshot.

stable.name: ALLOW_ADHOC_SUBQUERY
stable.description: Allow ad-hoc subqueries in SQL Lab

stable.name: CACHE_QUERY_BY_USER
stable.description: Enable caching per user key for Superset cache

stable.name: CSS_TEMPLATES
stable.description: Enables CSS Templates in Settings menu and dashboard forms

stable.name: DASHBOARD_RBAC
stable.description: Role-based access control for dashboards

stable.name: DASHBOARD_VIRTUALIZATION
stable.description: Enables dashboard virtualization for improved performance

stable.name: DASHBOARD_VIRTUALIZATION_DEFER_DATA
stable.description: Supports simultaneous data and dashboard virtualization for backend performance

stable.name: DATAPANEL_CLOSED_BY_DEFAULT
stable.description: Data panel closed by default in chart builder

stable.name: DISABLE_EMBEDDED_SUPERSET_LOGOUT
stable.description: Hide the logout button in embedded contexts (e.g., when using SSO in iframes)

stable.name: DRILL_BY
stable.description: Enable drill-by functionality in charts

stable.name: DRUID_JOINS
stable.description: Enable Druid JOINs (requires Druid version with JOIN support)

stable.name: EMBEDDABLE_CHARTS
stable.description: Enable sharing charts with embedding

stable.name: EMBEDDED_SUPERSET
stable.description: Enable embedded Superset functionality

stable.name: ENABLE_FACTORY_RESET_COMMAND
stable.description: Enable factory reset CLI command

stable.name: ENABLE_TEMPLATE_PROCESSING
stable.description: Enable Jinja templating in SQL queries

stable.name: ESCAPE_MARKDOWN_HTML
stable.description: Escape HTML in Markdown components (rather than rendering it)

stable.name: FILTERBAR_CLOSED_BY_DEFAULT
stable.description: Filter bar closed by default when opening dashboard

stable.name: FORCE_GARBAGE_COLLECTION_AFTER_EVERY_REQUEST
stable.description: Force garbage collection after every request

stable.name: LISTVIEWS_DEFAULT_CARD_VIEW
stable.description: Use card view as default in list views

stable.name: MENU_HIDE_USER_INFO
stable.description: Hide user info in the navigation menu

stable.name: SLACK_ENABLE_AVATARS
stable.description: Use Slack avatars for users. Requires adding slack-edge.com to TALISMAN_CONFIG.

stable.name: SQLLAB_BACKEND_PERSISTENCE
stable.description: Enable SQL Lab backend persistence for query state

stable.name: SQLLAB_FORCE_RUN_ASYNC
stable.description: Force SQL Lab to run async via Celery regardless of database settings

stable.name: THUMBNAILS
stable.description: Exposes API endpoint to compute thumbnails

deprecated.name: AVOID_COLORS_COLLISION
deprecated.description: Avoid color collisions in charts by using distinct colors

deprecated.name: ENABLE_JAVASCRIPT_CONTROLS
deprecated.description: Allow JavaScript in chart controls. WARNING: XSS security vulnerability!
